pages.text:
EVENTS
At CHOPS + HOPS we LOVE hosting events!
A guiding principle of how we’ve built our business is to bring people together in an intimate setting, free from outside distractions to provide a unique and immersive experience. There’s no better way to experience that than with a big group of your family, friends, co-workers, neighbors or people that you just want to get to know better.
Below is a list of events that we are happy to host:
Corporate and Team Building Events
Holiday Parties
Bachelor/ette Parties
Birthday Parties
Engagement Parties
Gender Reveal Parties
Charitable Events
And more!

WE’ve moved
THROW AXES. DRINK BEER.
NOW LOCATED inside
SISTRUNK MARKETPLACE
WORLD-CLASS COCKTAIL BAR + AXE THROWING LODGE
BOOK NOW
For Galleries
For Albums
For Pages
We are not just axe throwing.
We are not just another bar.
WE ARE PURVEYORS OF SOCIAL EXPERIENCES.
Throw Axes. Drink Beer. This simple motto pretty much sums up what you need to know about CHOPS + HOPS.  Whether you’re joining us for a drink with friends, to watch the big game or throw axes we strive to provide guests with unique and immersive social experiences.
While many may not be familiar with axe throwing YET, it is a centuries old activity that we have modernized to make it fun for couples, friends, colleagues, parties, corporate events and everything in between. We do this by providing instruction, games, a world-class bar program, and a lodge style setting to help you channel your inner lumberjack.
Our Axperts (yes, you should be prepared for lots of axe puns) will start your throwing session by teaching you the basics and working with you to refine your form (10-15 minutes). Once you’re throwing like real deal lumberjacks, they’ll officiate round robin or team style tournaments to get the competitive juices flowing amongst those in your throwing bay. Since axe throwing is all about form over power, we are confident that just about everyone will be throwing axes like a seasoned pro by the end of your throwing session.
Have more questions? Read our
FAQs
on our booking page for some helpful answers.
Location
WE”VE MOVED!
NOW LOCATED IN
SISTRUNK MARKETPLACE!
115 NW 6th St
Fort Lauderdale, FL 33311

For Albums
For Pages
Who is Axe Throwing and Beer Drinking for?
CHOPS + HOPS is for couples, friends, colleagues, parties, corporate events and everything in between. We do this by providing instruction, games, a rotating draft list of craft beer, awesome cocktails and a lodge style setting to help you channel your inner lumberjack.
All axe-throwing, beer drinking, wine chugging, cocktail chasing and/or spectating guests must be 21 years or older and axe throwers must wear closed toed shoes.
Axe throwing is $20-25 per person for 50 minutes of throwing based on the day and time you throw. Still have questions? Don’t worry, we did too. Check our FAQ’s below.
Book now
Have a group larger than 8? We’re happy to help! Fill out the form on our
Events Page
and one of our team members will assist you.
FAQ’s + Things to know
All guests must be 21+
All axe throwers
MUST
wear closed toed shoes.
Reservations are not required, but are
HIGHLY
recommended.
Tipping your Axpert is greatly appreciated. If they do a good job, show em some love.
Everyone throwing axes must arrive at least 15 minutes ahead of their designated throwing time to check in and sign your waiver.
If you show up intoxicated or our team feels you’ve had a little too much fun, you will not be able to throw axes.
We have a
NO REFUNDS
policy. Once you book and pay, we expect you to honor your reservation.
Can I bring my own axe?
While you get serious bonus points, we do not allow any outside equipment. This allows us to ensure a safe throwing environment for everyone involved.
Are you handicap/wheelchair accessible?
Absolutely. If you have the ability to hold an axe and complete a safe throwing motion, you can participate.
Will my group get a lane to itself or will we be throwing with other people?
Depends on the size of your group. Axe throwing is an activity that’s most fun as part of a group. Otherwise how will you know who’s the superior axe throwing human? Each lane can accommodate up to 4 throwers or 8 throwers per bay. Each bay will be competing amongst each other when the games start. If you are a smaller group (5 or less) you will likely be making some new axe friends. That being said, we always do our best to accommodate groups of any size and will work with you when possible.

Richter's Rye, Honey, Orgeat, Espresso
Stacey's Mom
Ketel One Peach & Orange Blossom, Lemon, Lychee, Lavender, Topped with Bubbles
Smoke On The Water
Mezcal, Cinnamon, Mexican Chocolate + Orange Bitters
The Don
Don Julio Añejo, Ginger, Red Fresno, Orange
World's Best Mojito
Marti Silver Rum, Fresh Mint, Fresh Lime
Le Eva
Gin, Rocky's Botanical, Honey, Cucumber, Lavender, Lime
END .menu-wrapper
